text.tspan: Orocos State Machine transitions example (RTT v2.8)
This example shows in which step which programs of which states are executed.
Once for a step where a transition to a next state succeeds ( from A to B in step 1),
and once for a step where no transition to another state succeed ( stay in B in step 2).
If a certain program is not present in a state, it is treated as an empty program.
